amendment.description: Comprised of the following amendments offered as En Bloc No. 3: Amendments Nos. 81, 82, 84, 86, 88, 89, 90, 92, 93, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99, 100, 102, 103, 107, 110, and 111 printed in House Report 115-297.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendments Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A101) offered by Mr. Culberson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Culberson amendments Agreed to by voice vote.
